content: this crochet pattern is designed for a towel wall hanging placemat or small rug the pattern includes two pdf files in english worked in row worked from the center both versions are based on the same design and use the overlay mosaic crochet technique the pattern contains clear charts and written row-by-row instructions it is not a full step-by-step master class and does not include instructions for finishing or specific item construction the final size of the piece depends on yarn choice hook size and personal gauge the finished pieces shown in the photos were crocheted by different makers using this pattern each photo is credited to its maker directly on the image and is shared for inspiration and demonstration purposes
